meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lucas Peterson Beth Youngers Jake Ayres Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6486.

td.p: Lucas Peterson, an actor originally from Oak Park, Illinois
Beth Youngers, a swim coach from Rochester, Minnesota
Jake Ayres, a law student from San Diego, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,201)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: You would have been in great shape for this Final if you knew that one of America\'s most famous architects was of Welsh descent.)
...
(Alex: No, the famous architect is Frank Lloyd Wright.)
LucasWhat is Merlin\'s House
$2,900
BethWhat is Llewellyn? Llewell
$17,400
JakeWhat is Alan-a-dale?
$15,201
Taliesin')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Built in 1911, this Wisconsin home was named for a Welsh bard associated with King Arthur')
